trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Représente un en-tête ou un pied de page associé à un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> fournit des informations d'en-tête et de pied de page pour le <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> lorsqu'il est affiché en mode Aperçu avant impression.

trans-unit.source: If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Si fourni par le Concepteur de flux de travail, les utilisateurs peuvent configurer les en-têtes et pieds de page sur la **en-tête/pied de page** onglet sur le **mise en Page** boîte de dialogue.

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the
trans-unit.target: SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner avec qui

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a header; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a footer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> pour indiquer que le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> est un en-tête ; <see langword="false" /> pour indiquer que le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> est un pied de page.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le concepteur racine auquel l'en-tête ou le pied de page est appliqué.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> auquel le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> est appliqué.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le rectangle englobant de l'en-tête ou du pied de page sur l'aire de conception de workflow.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> qui borne le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> sur l'aire de conception de workflow.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit l'image associée à l'en-tête ou au pied de page.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> à associer à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le rectangle englobant pour l'image associée à l'en-tête ou au pied de page.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> qui définit les limites du <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /> associé au <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple qui suit montre comment substituer la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> to draw the image in the upper left corner of the header/footer.
trans-unit.target: Dans cet exemple, le <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> est calculé à l'aide des limites du <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> pour dessiner l'image dans le coin supérieur gauche de l'en-tête/pied de page.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> qui contient les données d'événement.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
trans-unit.target: Notifie le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> lorsque les éléments qu'il contient sont repositionnés par l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> qui contient les données d'événement.

trans-unit.source: Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Dessine l'en-tête ou le pied de page associé au concepteur racine de workflow sur l'aire de conception.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contient une référence Null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit la description de texte associée à l'en-tête ou au pied de page.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the text description associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: Chaîne qui contient la description de texte associée au <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le rectangle englobant pour le texte associé à l'en-tête ou au pied de page.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> qui définit les limites du <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /> associé au <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple qui suit montre comment substituer la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> as well as the location and size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dans cet exemple, le <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> est calculé à l'aide des limites du <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter>, ainsi que de l'emplacement et de la taille du <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
